name: Sphere Game Legendary
description:
This is the 5th game released for Xbox, now also available on Steam.
the newest game in the Sphere Game franchise now, with new mechanics, challenges and more diverse scenario variations.
Grab the metal bar to pass the obstacles and reach the portal to reach the next level.
Game developed by Diego Paes.

Resources:

  • Various map variations.
  • Camera with 3d perspective.
  • Skins for customizing the sphere.
  • Camera movement.
  • HDR.
  • Beautiful graphics.
